doc.plot: A mysterious glowing object has remained hidden in the City of the Desert for eons. Thousands of pilgrims have tried in vain to reveal it's powerful secrets. A lonely wanderer, guided only by his faith, searches for this ancient city that appears only to those who are ready to receive its power.
